'''Bongo-Head''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Floating Hydro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Floating Hydro Fungus V3

|name_1      = Surging Waterdrops
|desc_1      = Cast a Fountain of Waterdrops four times at opponents randomly and deal '''600% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} per hit.

|name_2      = Piercing Mist
|desc_2      = After casting 2 Precision Bubbles, the next Normal Attack will become a Charged Attack that releases a Mist Bubble, dealing '''600% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} upon hitting its target.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Fires 1 Precision Bubble, dealing '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
}}
